review.reviewBody: Amazing food! Came very hot and really good flavour. Massive portion of pasta and Focaccia bread. Focaccia bread well seasoned better than other restaurants.
The Lasagna Casalinga was very generous but it was lacking some flavour. The Tiramisu was quite  good.
I love their pasta(vongole and seafood pasta). Full of flavor and great portion. Authentic Italian flavor pizzas too! Highly recommended!
The Linguine alla Carbonara is incredible. I add fresh vegetables and theyre perfectly done every time; nicely cooked and still crunchy. I'm hooked.

Now that was just the absolute best Italian food I've ever had!!! I'm half Italian and I've never been so proud to be Italian...I'm thinking  this ranks as probably the best food I've ever eaten... (a tie with Bobo De Camerao, a Brazilian dish I had in Rio). Damn, this made me want to travel to Italy! I can't believe I've been eating at Anton's and Lombardos for all these years and neglecting to try Baci. Good thing Anton's had a 3 hour wait tonight and I was able to pick up my order in 20 min from Baci. It was a life experience... try new places and listen to Cliff. He told me to go here long time ago and Cliff you were right!!! Get the Gnocchi Pomodoro and throw on some extra pesto sauce. I always do that and tonight it paid off... big time! Thank you Baci! I will forever be grateful for such an amazing meal. You are making people very very happy! Mucho amore! Valeu!
